actions.description: The deathwolf makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Phantom Deathwolf if available.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on saving throws against the frightened condition. This curse lasts until removed by the Remove Curse spell or other magic.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description:
The deathwolf creates a terrifying phantom of itself in the mind of a creature the deathwolf can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or have the frightened condition for 1 minute.

While the target is frightened, the phantom deals 21 (6d6) psychic damage to the target at the start of each of the target's turns. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Phantom Deathwolf (Recharge 5-6)

damageImmunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
name: Deathwolf [VEoR]

specialTraits.description: If the deathwolf fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)

specialTraits.description: When the deathwolf falls, it descends at a rate of 60 feet per round and takes no falling damage.
specialTraits.name: Moon's Grace
